Name: Verify Successful Placement of Order from Category Chekhly Na Iphone
Description: Navigate to the home page and select the category for iPhone cases. Proceed to view the products on sale and place an order. Verify the contents of the cart.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/chekhly-na-iphone'
step 3: Click on link ' Sale' -> Navigate to page 'product/*'
step 4: Click on svg
step 5: Click on link ' Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Checkout Process and Shipping Address Confirmation
Description: Navigate to the home page and proceed to checkout. Enter the required information and continue to the shipping address confirmation. Verify the displayed shipping address.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Click on button
step 3: Click on label
step 4: Click on svg
step 5: Click on link ' Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 6: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout ' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 7: Click on input field 'email'
step 8: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 9: Click on div
step 10: Click on div
step 11: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING'
step 12: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 13: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Displayed Category Samsung on Phone Page
Description: Navigate to the home page and hover over the phone section. Select the Apple category and then the Samsung category. Verify the displayed Samsung category page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
step 2: Hover over list item
step 3: Click on link 'Phone'
step 4: Click on link 'Phone'
step 5: Click on link 'Apple'
step 6: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/apple'
step 7: Click on link 'Samsung'
step 8: Click on link 'Samsung' -> Navigate to page 'category/samsung'
step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
